ygData.subject: The shadow messenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Pegatron was now far away from the battle site where he lost his arm, in a cave so he knew he was in security. Now how should I put my arm back? he said.

Pegatron was now far away from the battle site where he lost his 
arm, in a cave so he knew he was in security. "Now how should I put my 
arm back?" he said.

After a few moment, everything around him was black. And so he fell 
inconcient. But just when he woke up, hia arm was back to normal and 
100% functionnal.
